Performance:
February 1983: Gonza the Lancer

Production: February 1983

Play: Gonza the Lancer (鑓の権三重帷子)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Hamanomiya Riding Ground (浜の宮馬場 / Hamanomiya no baba)

The House of Ichinoshin Asaka (浅香市之進留守宅 / Asaka Ichinoshin rusutaku)

The Tea Ceremony House (数寄屋 / Sukiya)

The House of Chutabei Iwaki (岩木忠太兵衛屋敷 / Iwaki Chūtabei yashiki)

The Revenge on Kyobashi Bridge in Fushimi (伏見京橋女敵討 / Fushimi kyōbashi megatakiuchi)

Characters:

Gonza (Sasano Gonza / 笹野権三)

Oyuki (Musume Oyuki / 娘お雪)

Oyuki's governess (Oyuki no uba / お雪の乳母)

Bannojo (Kawazura Bannojō / 川側伴之丞)

Chutabei (Iwaki Chūtabei / 岩木忠太兵衛)

Osai (Osai / おさゐ)

Kakusuke, a servant (Yakko Kakusuke / 奴角助)

Torajiro, Osai's son (Segare Torajirō / 伜虎次郎)

Okiku, Osai's daughter (Musume Okiku / 娘お菊)

Man, a maid (Gejo Man / 下女まん)

Osugi, a maid (Gejo Osugi / 下女お杉)

Namisuke, a servant (Genin Namisuke / 下人(仲間,奴)浪介)

Ichinoshin (Asaka Ichinoshin / 浅香市之進)

Osai's mother (Osai haha / おさゐ母 )

Osute (Musume Osute / 娘お捨)

Jimbei (Iwaki Jinbei / 岩木甚平 )

Dancer (Odoriko / 踊り子)

Jinnai, a servant (Yakko Jinnai / 奴甚内)

Servants (Yakko / 奴)

Retainer (Wakatō / 若党)

Servants (Chūgen / 仲間)
